Text: Thanks from Alabama, US. It was nice to have the last two episodes early and the edited together first episode was a bonus. As it says, its dvd quality, and no pesky logo in the corner. I'm surprised I'm the first to thank you, but whatever, I guess people are busy.
Thank you VERY much for this! Big props to you for posting this so quickly!
Thanks a lot from Spain. I haven't seen it yet, but I hope I'll enjoy it. Thank you very much.

Hi! Thanks for this show, it's incredibly funny!

I just have a small technical question since you ripped these yourself: why did you choose 24 fps? I thought Australian TV -- and their consequent DVD releases -- used the PAL system, 25 fps. Thanks again!
